snippet.title: Karate for the Atari 2600
snippet.description:
Worst Atari 2600 game ever?

Well, I would say YES, but thrn again there are games like Sssnske and Fire Fly.

Anyways...this game sucks because of horrible hit detection and controls and monotonous and repetitive gameplay.
